<ul>
<li>To make the bot move in any given direction..<br>we worked on deciding speed of each wheel so that bot moves in the direction of all resultant forces.<br>as we felt mathematical model of four omni- wheeled bot is too easy... we tried to build a bot with three wheels.</li><li><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"> <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"></li><li>simple vector calculation gives you  required speed of each wheel.</li><li>To make wheel rotate at particular speed... we need use motors in pwm mode in aurduino...</li><li>And those motors need high voltage of 12v or more..but aurduino can't provide that..and we also need to change direction of rotation <br>of wheel some times...<br>To serve all those needs.. using L293D is better way...</li><li>Each L293D can control 2 motors independently at two different speeds.</li><li>we learnt how to use a L293D.</li><li>As we decide to send data(angle value) through bluetooth.. we need to know how to connect aurduino and bluetooth module..</li><li>And then making an android app to send that data..</li><li>To make an android app we did a lot of work...</li></ul>
